title.narrative: Kafue-Muzuma-Victoria Falls Regional Transmission Line Reinforcement Project

description.narrative: To improve the reliability of ZESCO's regional power trade transmission network infrastructure along the Kafue Town - Muzuma - Victoria Falls corridor.
